wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor

Class EditorComponent.TextController

  • java.lang.Object
    • wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor.EditorComponent.TextController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener, EditorComponent.Controller, IChoicesParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditorComponent.EditableTC, EditorComponent.NonEditableTC
    Enclosing class:
    EditorComponent

    private abstract class EditorComponent.TextController
extends java.lang.Object
implements EditorComponent.Controller, javax.swing.event.CaretListener, IChoicesParser
    Parent class of controllers with text enabled edition.

      • updateFilter

        protected void updateFilter(java.lang.String text,
                ChoiceMatch match,
                boolean userUpdate)
        Updates the filter and content variables, propagating the filter.
        Parameters:
        text - the current content; if null, is retrieved from the text field
        match - the popup match for the given text. If null, is retrieved from the text
        userUpdate - true if the update is due to some user input

      • setEditorText

        protected void setEditorText(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the editor text, as a programmed action (userUpdate=false).

      • consolidateInstantFilter

        protected abstract void consolidateInstantFilter(java.lang.String text,
                            java.lang.String content)
        Method called when consolidating a filter instant, if the text and the filter content do not match.
